alert.note: Alert for Central Greenville; Greenville Mountains; Northern Spartanburg; Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 27 at 6:29AM EST until February 27 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In North Carolina, Lincoln County. In South Carolina, Greenville Mountains, Central Greenville, Northern Spartanburg and Southern Spartanburg Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Isolated areas of patchy dense fog could remain in place in the NC Piedmont as late as 11 AM EST Monday.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your low-beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Central Greenville; Greenville Mountains; Northern Spartanburg; Southern Spartanburg
